meanings.definition: Coming after the seventeenth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The eighteenth cupcake was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her eighteenth birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent3: The eighteenth puppy in the litter had a mischievous twinkle in its eye.
meanings.sent4: The eighteenth star in the sky shone the brightest that night.
meanings.sent5: The eighteenth flower in the garden bloomed late but was the most beautiful.

meanings.sent1: She ate the eighteenth cookie from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The eighteenth of the month is her favorite day.
meanings.sent3: The eighteenth slice of pizza made him realize he had eaten too much.
meanings.sent4: The eighteenth piece of the puzzle finally revealed the whole picture.
meanings.sent5: The eighteenth player on the team scored the winning goal.

meanings.sent1: In line, he was the eighteenth person waiting for the bus.
meanings.sent2: Her birthday falls on the eighteenth of December.
meanings.sent3: The eighteenth in line at the ice cream shop got the last scoop of their favorite flavor.
meanings.sent4: The eighteenth chapter of the book held the key to the mystery.
meanings.sent5: On the eighteenth page of the menu, they found their favorite dish.
